001package reversi;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Arrays;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.stream.IntStream;
007
008public class Table extends Object {
009    private Integer maxColumn;
010    private Integer maxRow;
011    private Grid wall;
012    private Piece empty;
013    private List<Grid> grids;
014    private List<Integer> direction;
015
016    public Table(Integer aMaxColumn, Integer aMaxRow) {
017        maxColumn = aMaxColumn;
018        maxRow = aMaxRow;
019        direction = Arrays.asList(-maxColumn, 1, maxColumn, -1, -maxColumn - 1, -maxColumn + 1, maxColumn + 1,
020                maxColumn - 1);
021        this.initialize();
022        return;
023    }
024
025    public void initialize() {
026        wall = new Grid(new Piece(-1));
027        empty = new Piece(0);
028        grids = new ArrayList<>();
029        IntStream.range(0, maxColumn * maxRow).forEach(i -> grids.add(new Grid(empty,i)));
030        grids.forEach(item -> {
031            item.initialize(maxColumn);
032            item.setNextGrids(nextGridList(item));
033        });
034        return;
035    }
036
037    public List<Grid> nextGridList(Grid aGrid) {
038        List<Grid> aList = new ArrayList<>();
039        Integer index = grids.indexOf(aGrid);
040        direction.forEach(item -> {
041            if (isEndGrid(aGrid, item))
042                aList.add(wall);
043            else
044                aList.add(grids.get(index + item));
045        });
046        return aList;
047    }
048
049    public Boolean isEndGrid(Grid aGrid, Integer aDirection) {
050        if (aGrid.getColumn() == 0
051                && (aDirection == -maxColumn - 1 || aDirection == -1 || aDirection == maxColumn - 1))
052            return true;
053        if (aGrid.getColumn() == maxColumn - 1
054                && (aDirection == -maxColumn + 1 || aDirection == 1 || aDirection == maxColumn + 1))
055            return true;
056        if (aGrid.getRow() == 0
057                && (aDirection == -maxColumn - 1 || aDirection == -maxColumn || aDirection == -maxColumn + 1))
058            return true;
059        if (aGrid.getRow() == maxRow - 1
060                && (aDirection == maxColumn - 1 || aDirection == maxColumn || aDirection == maxColumn + 1))
061            return true;
062        return false;
063    }
064
065    public Boolean isPlacePiece(Player aPlayer, Integer aColumn, Integer aRow) {
066        Integer aColor = aPlayer.getColor();
067        Grid aGrid = this.getGrid(aColumn, aRow);
068        if(!aGrid.isPlacePiece()) return false;
069        Integer index = 0;
070        for (Grid aNextGrid : aGrid.getNextGrids()) {
071            Integer aGridColor = aNextGrid.getColor();
072            if (aGridColor > 0 && aGridColor != aColor && isPlacePieceColumn(aColor, aNextGrid.getNextGrid(index), index))
073                return true;
074            else
075                index++;
076        }
077        return false;
078    }
079
080    public Boolean isPlacePieceColumn(Integer aColor, Grid aGrid, Integer index) {
081        Integer aGridColor = aGrid.getColor();
082        if (aGridColor <= 0)
083            return false;
084        if (aGridColor == aColor)
085            return true;
086        return isPlacePieceColumn(aColor, aGrid.getNextGrid(index), index);
087    }
088
089    public Integer getMaxColumn() {
090        return maxColumn;
091    }
092
093    public Integer getMaxRow() {
094        return maxRow;
095    }
096
097    public List<Grid> getGrids() {
098        return grids;
099    }
100
101    public Grid getGrid(Integer aColumn, Integer aRow) {
102        Integer index = this.getIndex(aColumn, aRow);
103        return grids.get(index);
104    }
105
106    public Integer getIndex(Integer aColumn, Integer aRow) {
107        return aColumn + (aRow * maxColumn);
108    }
109
110    public Integer getEmptyCount(){
111        return empty.getCount();
112    }
113
114    public Grid getWallGrid(){
115        return wall;
116    }
117
118    public Piece getEmptyPiece(){
119        return empty;
120    }
121}
